description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 300,000 paying customers from 175+ countries. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★

WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy on-the-go learning app for COBOL Programming. The app helps you understand the basics in a nice and organized manner. Features include tutorials, quizzes, flashcards and more.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App tools include search feature.



Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
COBOL Programming Basics,
Fundamentals of COBOL,
COBOL Programming Divisions,
Data Items,
Group and Level Structure,
COBOL Verbs,
Arithmetic Operations I,
Arithmetic Operations II,
Arithmetic Operations III,
INPUT-OUTPUT,
File Handling and Processing,
Sample Programs.

Includes following quizzes:

Quiz 1,
Quiz 2.


What is unique about WAGmob apps?

1) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

2) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

3) Over 300,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.


Our Vision: Provide simple ‘n easy apps for on-the-go learning.

Our Mission: A WAGmob app in every pocket.

Please write to us Team@WAGmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
